name: PacMan Reloaded
description:
In this submission, you play as PacMan, trapped in the haunted mansion of your nemeses, the Ghosts. Your aim is to escape the mansion using the strength of all collected pellets. You have a revolver with limited amounts of ammo, which you can use to aid you on this quest.

Instructions:

Use Left Shift to access the pause menu in game

Use Escape to lock or unlock your cursor

Basic wasd movement for movement and left-click to shoot

There are bonus collectible fruit and others whic you can collect to boost your score

Please feel free to submit your final times and highscores and give any suggestions as to how I can improve the game
